constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 47 (Friday, March 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. RUIZ:
H.R. 1889.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8, Clauses 1 and 18 of the United States
Constitution, to provide for the general welfare and make all
laws necessary and proper to carry out the powers of
Congress.
[Page H1365]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.

title: Environmental Justice for Coronavirus Affected Communities Act
